name: Ghost Cafe
description:
Play as a ghost waiter serving food to hungry ghosts.  At the end of the night, you'll be able to see how much you scored. Try to get a high score by delivering orders in a timely manner to your spooky guests!

Controls:

Movement: AWSD

Pick-Up/Drop items: Right/Left click

Pause: Escape

Developers:

Kayla Sanderson - Programmer

Jackson Westbrook - Lead Programmer

Nyela Allen - Programmer, Production Manager, Sound Designer

Sadra Williams - 2d Character Artist, UI Artist

Marianna F. - 2d Character Artist, UI Artist, Object Artist

Natalia Rivera Rentas - 2d Character Artist, 2d Environment Artist, Animator
